channel.title: Npcs attack back and multiple drops? help please
channel.description:
Ok how do i make an npc fight back and attack at certain intervals, right now it only hurts you if you click on it while attacking or special it...
Also, how do i make an npc drop more than 1 item? Example: monster a drops x amount of bones per kill
